<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\file This pass verifies incoming and outgoing CFA information of basic</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="comment">/// blocks. CFA information is information about offset and register set by CFI</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="comment">/// directives, valid at the start and end of a basic block. This pass checks</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="comment">/// that outgoing information of predecessors matches incoming information of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="comment">/// their successors. Then it checks if blocks have correct CFA calculation rule</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="comment">/// set and inserts additional CFI instruction at their beginnings if they</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="comment">/// don&#39;t. CFI instructions are inserted if basic blocks have incorrect offset</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="comment">/// or register set by previous blocks, as a result of a non-linear layout of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="comment">/// blocks in a function.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CFIInstrInserter::verify(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ErrorNum = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;CurrMBB : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ad6e19a09aeed4c56617c284e099c81de">depth&#95;first</a>(&amp;MF)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MBBCFAInfo &amp;CurrMBBInfo = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/prologepiloginserter-cpp/#a16e1dce3ef595b035bc2f10e763d0ce6">MBBVector</a>&#91;CurrMBB-&gt;getNumber()&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42;Succ : CurrMBB-&gt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ad88ff1529541fb4e243cc8ed90b11131">successors</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MBBCFAInfo &amp;SuccMBBInfo = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/prologepiloginserter-cpp/#a16e1dce3ef595b035bc2f10e763d0ce6">MBBVector</a>&#91;Succ-&gt;getNumber()&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check that incoming offset and register values of successors match the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// outgoing offset and register values of CurrMBB</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SuccMBBInfo.IncomingCFAOffset != CurrMBBInfo.OutgoingCFAOffset ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="normal">          SuccMBBInfo.IncomingCFARegister != CurrMBBInfo.OutgoingCFARegister) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Inconsistent offsets/registers are ok for &#39;noreturn&#39; blocks because</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// we don&#39;t generate epilogues inside such blocks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SuccMBBInfo.MBB-&gt;succ&#95;empty() &amp;&amp; !SuccMBBInfo.MBB-&gt;isReturnBlock())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="normal">        reportCFAError(CurrMBBInfo, SuccMBBInfo);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="normal">        ErrorNum++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check that IncomingCSRSaved of every successor matches the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// OutgoingCSRSaved of CurrMBB</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SuccMBBInfo.IncomingCSRSaved != CurrMBBInfo.OutgoingCSRSaved) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="normal">        reportCSRError(CurrMBBInfo, SuccMBBInfo);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><Highlight kind="normal">        ErrorNum++;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ErrorNum;</Highlight></CodeLine>
